00027    * Constructor.

00029    template <int N>
00030    GroupDistributor<N>::GroupDistributor() 
00031     : cache_(),
00032       newPtr_(0),
00033       domainPtr_(0),
00034       atomStoragePtr_(0),
00035       groupStoragePtr_(0),
00036       bufferPtr_(0),
00037       sendType_(Buffer::NONE),
00038       nAtomRecv_(0),
00039       nSentTotal_(0),
00040       cacheSize_(0),
00041       cacheCapacity_(0)
00042    {}

00047    template <int N>
00048    GroupDistributor<N>::~GroupDistributor() 
00049    {}

00051    /*
00052    * Retain pointers to associated objects.
00053    */
00054    template <int N>
00055    void GroupDistributor<N>::associate(Domain& domain, 
00056                                        AtomStorage& atomStorage,
00057                                        GroupStorage<N>& groupStorage, 
00058                                        Buffer& buffer)
00059    {
00060       domainPtr_ = &domain;
00061       atomStoragePtr_ = &atomStorage;
00062       groupStoragePtr_ = &groupStorage;
00063       bufferPtr_ = &buffer;
00064    }

00066    /*
00067    * Set cache capacity and allocate all required memory.
00068    */
00069    template <int N>
00070    void GroupDistributor<N>::initialize(int cacheCapacity)
00071    {
00072       cacheCapacity_ = cacheCapacity;
00073       allocate();
00074    }
00075 
00076    /*
00077    * Read cacheCapacity and allocate all required memory.
00078    */
00079    template <int N>
00080    void GroupDistributor<N>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00081    {
00082       // Read parameter file block
00083       readBegin(in, "GroupDistributor");
00084       read<int>(in, "cacheCapacity", cacheCapacity_);
00085       readEnd(in);
00086  
00087       // Do actual allocation
00088       allocate();
00089    }
00090 
00091    /*
00092    * Allocate memory and initialize state (private method).
00093    */
00094    template <int N>
00095    void GroupDistributor<N>::allocate()
00096    {
00097       // Preconditions
00098       if (atomStoragePtr_ == 0) {
00099          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor not initialized");
00100       }
00101       cache_.allocate(cacheCapacity_);
00102       nAtomRecv_ = 0;
00103       newPtr_ = 0;
00104    }
00105 
00106    /*
00107    *
00108    */
00109    template <int N>
00110    void GroupDistributor<N>::setup()
00111    {
00112       bufferPtr_->clearSendBuffer();
00113       bufferPtr_->beginSendBlock(Buffer::GROUP, N);
00114       nAtomRecv_ = 0;
00115       newPtr_ = 0;
00116    }
00117 
00118    /*
00119    * Returns address for a new local Group.
00120    */ 
00121    template <int N>
00122    Group<N>* GroupDistributor<N>::newPtr()
00123    {
00124       // Preconditions
00125       if (atomStoragePtr_ == 0) {
00126          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor is not initialized");
00127       }
00128       if (groupStoragePtr_ == 0) {
00129          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor is not initialized");
00130       }
00131       if (domainPtr_->gridRank() != 0) {
00132          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor::add called on slave node");
00133       }
00134       if (cache_.capacity() <= 0) {
00135          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor cache is not allocated");
00136       }
00137       if (newPtr_ != 0) {
00138          UTIL_THROW("A newPtr_ is still active");
00139       }
00140 
00141       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00142       if (cacheSize_ == cacheCapacity_) {
00143           bool isComplete = false;
00144           int  source = 0;
00145           bufferPtr_->endSendBlock(isComplete);
00146           bufferPtr_->bcast(domainPtr_->communicator(), source);
00147           nSentTotal_ += cacheSize_;
00148           bufferPtr_->clearSendBuffer();
00149           bufferPtr_->beginSendBlock(Buffer::GROUP, N);
00150           cacheSize_ = 0;
00151       }
00152       #endif
00153       newPtr_ = &cache_[cacheSize_];
00154       return newPtr_;
00155    }
00156 
00157    /*
00158    * Add an atom to the list to be sent.
00159    */ 
00160    template <int N>
00161    void GroupDistributor<N>::add()
00162    {
00163       // Preconditions
00164       if (atomStoragePtr_ == 0) {
00165          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor is not initialized");
00166       }
00167       if (groupStoragePtr_ == 0) {
00168          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor is not initialized");
00169       }
00170       if (domainPtr_ == 0) {
00171          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor is not initialized");
00172       }
00173       if (!domainPtr_->isInitialized()) {
00174          UTIL_THROW("Domain is not initialized");
00175       }
00176       if (domainPtr_->gridRank() != 0) {
00177          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor::add called on slave node");
00178       }
00179       if (cache_.capacity() <= 0) {
00180          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor cache is not allocated");
00181       }
00182       if (atomStoragePtr_->nGhost() != 0) {
00183          UTIL_THROW("AtomStorage has ghosts");
00184       }
00185       if (newPtr_ == 0) {
00186          UTIL_THROW("newPtr is null on entry to add()");
00187       }
00188 
00189       // If group has at least one atoms on master, add to groupStorage.
00190       int nAtom = atomStoragePtr_->findGroupAtoms(*newPtr_);
00191       if (nAtom > 0) {
00192          Group<N>* ptr = groupStoragePtr_->newPtr();
00193          *ptr = *newPtr_;
00194          groupStoragePtr_->add();
00195          nAtomRecv_ += nAtom;
00196       }
00197       bufferPtr_->packGroup(*newPtr_);
00198  
00199       // Nullify newPtr_ to release for reuse.
00200       newPtr_ = 0;
00201       ++cacheSize_;
00202 
00203    }
00204 
00205    /*
00206    * Send any groups that have not been sent previously.
00207    *
00208    * This method must be called only by the master processor.
00209    */
00210    template <int N>
00211    void GroupDistributor<N>::send()
00212    {
00213 
00214       // Preconditions
00215       if (atomStoragePtr_ == 0) {
00216          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor is not initialized");
00217       }
00218       if (groupStoragePtr_ == 0) {
00219          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor is not initialized");
00220       }
00221       if (domainPtr_ == 0) {
00222          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor is not initialized");
00223       }
00224       if (bufferPtr_ == 0) {
00225          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor is not initialized");
00226       }
00227       if (cacheCapacity_ <= 0) {
00228          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor is not allocated");
00229       }
00230       if (domainPtr_->gridRank() != 0) {
00231          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor::send called on slave node");
00232       }
00233       if (newPtr_ != 0) {
00234          UTIL_THROW("A newPtr_ is still active");
00235       }
00236 
00237       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00238       bool isComplete = true;
00239       int source = 0;
00240       bufferPtr_->endSendBlock(isComplete);
00241       bufferPtr_->bcast(domainPtr_->communicator(), source);
00242       nSentTotal_ += cacheSize_;
00243       bufferPtr_->clearSendBuffer();
00244 
00245       validate();
00246       groupStoragePtr_->computeNTotal(domainPtr_->communicator());
00247       if (groupStoragePtr_->nTotal() != nSentTotal_) {
00248          UTIL_THROW("Number of groups not equal number sent");
00249       }
00250       groupStoragePtr_->isValid(*atomStoragePtr_, domainPtr_->communicator(), 
00251                                 false);
00252       #else
00253       groupStoragePtr_->computeNTotal();
00254       if (groupStoragePtr_->nTotal() != nSentTotal_) {
00255          UTIL_THROW("Number of groups not equal number sent");
00256       }
00257       groupStoragePtr_->isValid(*atomStoragePtr_, false);
00258       #endif
00259 
00260       cacheSize_ = 0;
00261       newPtr_ = 0;
00262       nSentTotal_ = 0;
00263       nAtomRecv_ = 0;
00264    }
00265 
00266    /*
00267    * Receive all atoms sent by the master processor.
00268    *
00269    * Called by all processors except the master.
00270    */ 
00271    template <int N>
00272    void GroupDistributor<N>::receive()
00273    {
00274       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00275       // Preconditions 
00276       if (atomStoragePtr_ == 0) {
00277          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor is not initialized");
00278       }
00279       if (groupStoragePtr_ == 0) {
00280          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor is not initialized");
00281       }
00282       if (domainPtr_ == 0) {
00283          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor is not initialized");
00284       }
00285       if (bufferPtr_ == 0) {
00286          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor is not initialized");
00287       }
00288       if (domainPtr_->gridRank() == 0) {
00289          UTIL_THROW("GroupDistributor::receive called on master node");
00290       }
00291       if (atomStoragePtr_->nGhost() != 0) {
00292          UTIL_THROW("AtomStorage has ghosts");
00293       }
00294 
00295       Group<N>* ptr;
00296       int  nAtom;
00297       bool isComplete = false;
00298       const int source = 0;
00299 
00300       nAtomRecv_ = 0;
00301       while (!isComplete) {
00302 
00303          // Receive broadcast
00304          bufferPtr_->bcast(domainPtr_->communicator(), source);
00305       
00306          // Unpack the buffer, set pointers to atoms
00307          isComplete = bufferPtr_->beginRecvBlock();
00308          while (bufferPtr_->recvSize() > 0) {
00309             ptr = groupStoragePtr_->newPtr();
00310             bufferPtr_->unpackGroup(*ptr);
00311             nAtom = atomStoragePtr_->findGroupAtoms(*ptr);
00312             if (nAtom > 0) {
00313                groupStoragePtr_->add();
00314                nAtomRecv_ += nAtom;
00315             } else if (nAtom == 0) {
00316                groupStoragePtr_->returnPtr();
00317             } else {
00318                UTIL_THROW("Invalid return value from findGroupAtoms");
00319             }
00320          }
00321 
00322       }
00323       validate();
00324 
00325       // Validate Group Storage
00326       groupStoragePtr_->computeNTotal(domainPtr_->communicator());
00327       groupStoragePtr_->isValid(*atomStoragePtr_, domainPtr_->communicator(),
00328                                 false);
00329 
00330       nAtomRecv_ = 0;
00331       #endif
00332    }
00333 
00334    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00335 
00338    template <int N>
00339    void GroupDistributor<N>::validate() 
00340    {
00341       int nAtomRecvTot;
00342       const int source = 0;
00343       domainPtr_->communicator()
00344              .Reduce(&nAtomRecv_, &nAtomRecvTot, 1, MPI::INT, MPI::SUM, source);
00345       if (domainPtr_->gridRank() == 0) {
00346          if (nAtomRecvTot != nSentTotal_*N) {
00347              std::cout << "nSentTotal_*N = " << nSentTotal_*N << std::endl;
00348              std::cout << "nAtomRecvTot  = " << nAtomRecvTot  << std::endl;
00349              UTIL_THROW("Discrepancy in number of local atoms in groups");
00350          }
00351       }
00352    }
00353    #endif
00354 
00355 }
00356 #endif
